# Microsoft DirectX SDK 9.0b

This is a minimalized version of Microsofts DirectX SDK. It only contains the folders `Include`, `Lib` and `License`. It's suitable for compiling DirectX SDK 9.0b-based projects.

## License

* [DirectX End User EULA](License/DirectX End User EULA.txt)
* [directx redist](License/directx redist.txt)
* [DirectX SDK EULA](License/DirectX SDK EULA.txt)
